serviceName: AWS IoT managed integrations feature of IoT Device Management

actions.name: CreateCredentialLocker
actions.description: Grants permission to create a product credential locker. This operation will trigger the creation of all the manufacturing resources including Wi-Fi setup key pair and device certificate

actions.name: CreateDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to create a destination

actions.name: CreateEventLogConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to set the event log configuration for the account, a resource type, or a specific resource

actions.name: CreateManagedThing
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Managed Thing

actions.name: CreateNotificationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create a notification configuration

actions.name: CreateOtaTask
actions.description: Grants permission to customers to create an OTA task to update their devices

actions.name: CreateOtaTaskConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create an OTA task configuration

actions.name: CreateProvisioningProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new provisioning profile

actions.name: DeleteCredentialLocker
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Credential Locker. This operation cannot be undone and any existing device won't be able to use the IoT managed integrations Setup

actions.name: DeleteDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a destination

actions.name: DeleteEventLogConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an event log configuration by log configuration ID

actions.name: DeleteManagedThing
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a managed thing. If a Controller is deleted, all the devices connected to it will have their status changed to pending. Note, it is not possible to remove a Cloud device

actions.name: DeleteNotificationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a notification configuration

actions.name: DeleteOtaTask
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an OTA task

actions.name: DeleteOtaTaskConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a OTA task configuration

actions.name: DeleteProvisioningProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a provisioning Profile

actions.name: GetCredentialLocker
actions.description: Grants permission to get an existing Credential Locker information

actions.name: GetCustomEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to customers to retrieve the custom endpoint address

actions.name: GetDefaultEncryptionConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get a connector by AWS ARN

actions.name: GetDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to get a destination

actions.name: GetDeviceDiscovery
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current state of a device discovery

actions.name: GetEventLogConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get an event log configuration by log configuration ID

actions.name: GetHubConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get hub configuration

actions.name: GetManagedThing
actions.description: Grants permission to get a managed thing

actions.name: GetManagedThingCapabilities
actions.description: Grants permission to get capabilities by ManagedThingId

actions.name: GetManagedThingConnectivityData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the connectivity status of a Managed Thing

actions.name: GetManagedThingMetaData
actions.description: Grants permission to get metaData info by ManagedThingId

actions.name: GetManagedThingState
actions.description: Grants permission to get managed thing states by managed thing id

actions.name: GetNotificationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get a notification configuration

actions.name: GetOtaTask
actions.description: Grants permission to get the Ota task

actions.name: GetOtaTaskConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get an OTA task configuration

actions.name: GetProvisioningProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to get an existing provisioning profile information

actions.name: GetRuntimeLogConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get runtime log configuration for a specific managed thing or for all managed things as a group

actions.name: GetSchemaVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to get a schema version with the provided information

actions.name: ListCredentialLockers
actions.description: Grants permission to list the existing Credential Locker

actions.name: ListDestinations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the destinations

actions.name: ListEventLogConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all event log configurations for account

actions.name: ListManagedThingSchemas
actions.description: Grants permission to list Schemas Associated With Managed Thing

actions.name: ListManagedThings
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the managed things

actions.name: ListNotificationConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the notification configurations

actions.name: ListOtaTaskConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the OTA task configurations

actions.name: ListOtaTaskExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the Ota task executions

actions.name: ListOtaTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the OTA tasks

actions.name: ListProvisioningProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to list the existing provisioning profile

actions.name: ListSchemaVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list schema versions with the provided information

actions.name: PutDefaultEncryptionConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to associate KMS key with IoT managed integrations

actions.name: PutHubConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update a hub configuration

actions.name: PutRuntimeLogConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to set the runtime log configuration for a specific managed thing or for all managed  things as a group

actions.name: RegisterCustomEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to customers to request us to manage the server trust for them or bring their own external server trusts for the custom domain

actions.name: ResetRuntimeLogConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to reset a runtime log configuration for a specific managed thing or for all managed things as a group

actions.name: SendManagedThingCommand
actions.description: Grants permission to use the SendManagedThingCommand API to send commands to managed things

actions.name: StartDeviceDiscovery
actions.description: Grants permission to request to start device discovery

actions.name: UpdateDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to update a destination

actions.name: UpdateEventLogConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update an event log configuration by log configuration ID

actions.name: UpdateManagedThing
actions.description: Grants permission to update a managed thing

actions.name: UpdateNotificationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update a notification configuration

actions.name: UpdateOtaTask
actions.description: Grants permission to update an OTA Task
